feedback.title: Customer Feedback
feedback.msg1: I easily got my online work permit from PathakOnline. The service provider was very friendly.
feedback.msg2: Fast and reliable! Highly recommend for passport and ID bookings.
feedback.msg3: Great support over WhatsApp. Smooth process overall.
